remarks: Membership relation that implies equality of spans.  ( ~ spansneleq analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lspsneleq.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsneleq.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsneleq.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsneleq.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsneleq.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsneleq.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
lspsneleq.z $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= .0. ) $.
lspsneleq $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) = ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
